pageContext.claim: “The Republicans.........are developing a really great HealthCare Plan with far lower premiums (cost) & deductibles than ObamaCare. In other words it will be far less expensive & much more usable than ObamaCare.”
pageContext.analysis: Republican leaders in Congress have largely given up on attempts to repeal and replace the Affordable Care Act. It's not clear that the GOP proposals being discussed would cause premiums and deductibles to decrease. In provisions of those bills, "Republicans said their purpose here was to make clear that the federal government could not tell health insurance plans what to charge," the New York Times reported.
